items.name: Sapphire Crystal
items.description: UNIQUE - Mana Charge: Grants 5 maximum Mana per ability cast, up to 250. Triggers up to 3 times every 12 seconds.

items.name: Aether Wisp
items.description: UNIQUE - WISP: +5% Movement Speed

items.name: Bami's Cinder
items.description: UNIQUE - IMMOLATE: Deals 10 - 20 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 15% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.description: UNIQUE - THORNS: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 4 (+6% bonus armor) magic damage, while also inflicting 40% Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 3 seconds.

items.name: Catalyst of Aeons
items.description: UNIQUE - ETERNITY: Restore mana equal to 15% of damage taken from champions. Restore health equal to 20% of mana spent, up to 15 health per cast, while toggle abilities can heal for up to 15 per second.

items.name: Executioner's Calling
items.description: UNIQUE -Sepsis: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds.

items.name: Hextech Revolver
items.description: UNIQUE - HEXTECH BOLT: Hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack or ability shocks them for 75 magic damage (30 second cooldown).

items.name: Kircheis Shard
items.description: UNIQUE - ENERGIZED: Moving and attacking generates Energy stacks. At maximum stacks your next attack deals 50 bonus magic damage and activates all Energized effects.

items.name: Last Whisper
items.description: UNIQUE - LAST WHISPER: +15% Armor Penetration

items.name: Oblivion Orb
items.description: UNIQUE - Cursed: Dealing magic damage inflicts 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

items.name: Phage
items.description: UNIQUE - RAGE: Basic attacks (on-hit) grant +( 20 melee / 10 ranged) flat movement speed for 2 seconds. Killing a unit grants +(60 Melee / 30 Ranged) flat movement speed instead. Bonuses do not stack.

items.name: Recurve Bow
items.description: Reinforced: Attacks deal 15 on-hit bonus physical damage against targets.

items.name: Serrated Dirk
items.description: UNIQUE - SHARP: +8 Armor Penetration

items.name: Spectre's Cowl
items.description: UNIQUE - SPECTRAL VISIT: Grants 150% health regen for 10 seconds after taking damage from an enemy champion.

items.name: Sheen
items.description: UNIQUE - SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. (1.5 second cooldown which begins after using the empowered attack). The damage is reduced against structures.

items.name: Tear of the Goddess
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Refunds 10% of mana spent. 

UNIQUE - MANA CHARGE: Grants a charge every 4 seconds, up to 3 charges. Each mana expenditure consumes a charge and grants +7 mana, up to a maximum of 700 mana. Mana gained from Sapphire Crystal’s Mana Charge carries over into Tear of the Goddess, so Tear can start with up to 250 Mana already stacked.

items.name: Void Amethyst
items.description: UNIQUE - DISSOLVE: +20% Magic Penetration

items.name: Warden's Mail
items.description: UNIQUE - COLD STEEL: Reduce the attack speed of enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds when struck by a basic attack.

items.name: Adaptive Helm
items.description: UNIQUE - ADAPTIVE: Taking magic damage from a spell or effect reduces all subsequent magic damage taken from that spell or effect by 15% for 4 seconds. Multiple sources of magic damage can have this effect active at any one time and the duration is tracked separately per source.

items.name: Abyssal Mask
items.description:
UNIQUE - ABYSSAL: When you take magic damage, gain 20% of the damage taken as remaining charges for 5 seconds. When you root an enemy Champion, consume your remaining charges to cause a 400 yard explosion near the first rooted target, dealing magic damage which is equal to the remaining charge.

UNIQUE - ETERNITY: Restore mana equal to 15% of damage taken from champions. Restore health equal to 20% of mana spent, up to 25 health per cast, while toggle abilities can heal for up to 25 per second.

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Grants bonus Ability Power equal to 1% maximum mana. Refunds 25% of mana spent.

UNIQUE - MANA CHARGE: Grants a charge every 4 seconds, up to 3 charges. Each mana expenditure consumes a charge and grants +15 mana, up to a maximum of 700 mana.

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +700 Mana.

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Ardent Censer
items.description: UNIQUE - CENSER: When you heal or shield an allied champion other than yourself, they gain 15-40% Attack Speed, and their basic attacks deal 20–40 bonus magic damage.

items.name: Athene's Unholy Grail
items.description: UNIQUE - BLOOD PRICE: Stores 35% of premitigation damage dealt to champions as Blood, capped at 110 - 250 (based on level). Healing or shielding an ally consumes all Blood to heal them for an equal value.

items.name: Black Cleaver
items.description:
UNIQUE - SUNDER: Dealing physical damage to a champion reduces their Armor by 6% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for 24% reduction.

UNIQUE - RAGE: Gain 20 Movement Speed when you deal physical damage, and gain 40 Movement Speed when moving toward enemy champions with 4 Sunder stacks. Ranged champions gain halved values.

items.name: Blade of the Ruined King
items.description:
UNIQUE - THIRST: +10% Physical Vamp

UNIQUE - RUINED STRIKES: Basic attacks deal (9% Melee / 6% Ranged) of target's current health bonus physical damage. Deals a minimum of 15 damage, and against monsters deals a maximum of 60 damage.

UNIQUE - DRAIN: Hitting a champion with 3 basic attacks or abilities deals 30 - 100 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% of their movement speed for 3 seconds. (60 second cooldown)

items.name: Awakened Soulstealer
items.description:
Unique Passive - Soul Hunt: +15 magical penetration

Unique Passive - Wandering Soul: Every time you take down an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them, your ability cooldowns are reduced by 25%. You steal 10% of their base Movement Speed for 10 seconds and 50% of their Ability Haste until they respawn. Ability Haste stolen this way stacks.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description:
UNIQUE - BLOODY: +10% Physical Vamp

UNIQUE - BLOODSWORN: Gain 11 - 25 Attack Damage and 10% Attack Speed when your health is above 50%.

items.name: Dead Man's Plate
items.description:
UNIQUE - RELENTLESS:  +5% movement speed
UNIQUE - MOMENTUM: Moving builds Momentum, granting up to 40 Move Speed at 100 stacks. Attacking removes all Momentum. Stacks decay when movement is impaired.
UNIQUE - CRUSHING BLOW:  Attacks deal up to 100 bonus magic damage based on Momentum removed. Melee attacks with max Momentum slow by 50% for 1 second.

items.name: Death's Dance
items.description:
Unique - Cauterize: 32% of physical damage received (12% for ranged champions) is dealt to you over 3 seconds as true damage instead.
Unique - Dance: Champion takedowns cleanse Cauterize's remaining damage pool and restores 10% of your maximum health over 2 seconds.

items.name: Fimbulwinter
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 10% of maximum mana and refunds 15% of all mana spent.

UNIQUE - FROZEN COLOSSUS: Immobilizing or slowing an enemy champion consumes 3% current mana and grants a shield for 3 seconds, absorbing 90-180 + 4.5% current mana, increased by 50% if there is more than 1 enemy champion nearby. (8s cooldown)
This effect only activates while you have greater than 20% maximum mana.

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
items.description:
UNIQUE - RAZOR: +18 armor penetration

UNIQUE - NIGHTSTALKER: First basic attack against an enemy champion causes 60 - 160 bonus physical damage and slows enemies by 99% for 0.35 seconds. Cooldown will be refreshed when an enemy has been taken down.

items.name: Frozen Mallet
items.description: UNIQUE - ICY: Basic attacks slow enemies by (40% Melee / 20% Ranged) for 1.5 seconds.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.description: UNIQUE - RESURRECT: Upon taking lethal damage, resurrects and restores 50% of base health and 30% of maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis. (210 second cooldown)

items.name: Harmonic Echo
items.description: UNIQUE - HARMONIC ECHO: Moving and casting abilities builds Harmony. At 100 Harmony your next healing or shielding ability on an ally other than yourself restores 150 (+15% AP) health to your target. If the target's Health is below 40%, healing potency is increased to 150% of the original.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.description:
UNIQUE - ENERGY DRAIN: +15% Magical Vamp

UNIQUE - LIFE DRAIN: +15% Physical Vamp

UNIQUE - HEXTECH BOLT: Hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack or ability shocks them for 100 - 200 (based on level) (+30% AP) magic damage and slows them by 40% for 2 seconds. (30 second cooldown)

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.description: UNIQUE - INFINITY: Critical strikes deal 205% damage instead of 175%.

items.name: Infinity Orb
items.description:
UNIQUE - DESTINY: +5% movement speed
UNIQUE - BALANCE: +15 magic penetration
UNIQUE - INEVITABLE DEMISE: Abilities crit for 20% bonus damage against enemies below 35% health.

items.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
items.description: UNIQUE - SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage + 25% bonus armor on-hit. It also deals 100% base AD physical damage to enemies surrounding the target and creates an icy zone for 2 seconds, which slows enemies within by 30%. The zone has a radius of 180 (+55% bonus armor) units. The damage is reduced against structures. (1.5 second cooldown which begins after using the empowered attack).

items.name: Liandry's Torment
items.description: UNIQUE - TORMENT:  Damaging abilities or empowered attacks deal (0.4% + 0.005% AP) of enemy's max Health as bonus magic damage each second, over 3 seconds.

items.name: Lich Bane
items.description:
UNIQUE - SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 75% base AD (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit. (1.5 second cooldown which begins after using the empowered attack)

UNIQUE - BANE: +5% movement speed

items.name: Luden's Echo
items.description: UNIQUE - DISCORDIC ECHO: Moving and casting abilities builds Discord. At 100 Discord your next damaging ability deals 110 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and up to 3 nearby enemies.

items.name: Manamune
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 1.5% maximum mana. Refunds 15% of mana spent.

UNIQUE - MANA CHARGE: Grants a charge every 4 seconds, up to 3 charges. Each basic attack on-hit or mana expenditure consumes a charge and grants +10 mana, up to a maximum of 700 mana.

Transforms into Muramana at +700 mana.

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Maw of Malmortius
items.description: UNIQUE - Demonbane: 20% of the damage dealt by basic attacks or 15% physical damage dealt by abilities is converted into a magic shield that absorbs up to 60 - 400 magic damage.

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.description: UNIQUE - AFFLICTION: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts 50% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

items.name: Mortal Reminder
items.description:
UNIQUE - LAST WHISPER: +33% armor penetration.

UNIQUE - Sepsis: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions applies 50% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

items.name: Muramana
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Increases attack power by 2% of maximum mana and refunds 15% of total mana spent.

UNIQUE - SHOCK: When basic attacks hit an enemy champion, it will consume 2.5% of their current mana and cause additional physical damage equal to the amount consumed. When dealing skill damage to an enemy champion, consume 4% of current mana and cause additional physical damage of consumption +6% AD. This effect will only trigger when remaining mana is above 20%. A single skill can only be triggered once for the same champion.

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Phantom Dancer
items.description:
UNIQUE - SPECTRAL WALTZ: Gain 7% extra movement speed when you basic attack for 3 seconds. After attacking 4 times, gain an additional 25% attack speed for the same duration.

UNIQUE - Shadowwalk: +5% Movement Speed.

items.name: Nashor's Tooth
items.description:
UNIQUE - Magic Fang: Gain 30 Attack Damage or 60 Ability Power (Adaptive).
UNIQUE - Gnaw: When the basic attack hits the enemy champion, it will cause 15+25% bonus attack power + 25% bonus magic damage.

items.name: Protector's Vow
items.description: UNIQUE - PROTECTOR: Raise your Guard when next to an allied champion. If you or your ally take damage from a champion, monster, or turret, both of you receive a 125 (+30% bonus health) shield for 1.5 seconds. (20 second cooldown)

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.description: UNIQUE - OVERKILL: Increases ability power by 20 - 45 % (based on level).

items.name: Randuin's Omen
items.description: UNIQUE - Countercurrent: When you are Critically Struck by physical damage, gain 1 stack of Countercurrent. Each stack of Countercurrent grants 5% Critical Strike damage reduction. Stacks up to 4 times. Upon reaching full stacks, grants 20% bonus Movement Speed and slow resist equal to 20% plus 0.5% of bonus Health.

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.description:
UNIQUE - HUNTER'S SWIFTNESS: +5% movement speed

UNIQUE - ENERGIZED: Moving and attacking generates Energy stacks. At maximum stacks your next attack deals 50 - 120 (based on level) bonus magic damage and activates all Energized effects.

UNIQUE - FIRECANNON BARREL: Energy stacks charge 25% faster and Energized attacks have (50 Melee / 125 Ranged) bonus attack range.

items.name: Rod of Ages
items.description:
UNIQUE - ETERNITY: Restore mana equal to 15% of damage taken from champions. Restore health equal to 20% of mana spent, up to 25 health per cast, while toggle abilities can heal for up to 25 per second.

UNIQUE - VETERAN: Each stack provides 25 Health, 10 Mana, and 6 Ability power, stacking 1 every 40 seconds. Max of 10 stacks, providing 250 Health, 100 Mana, and 60 Ability Power.
This item gains 20 health, 10 mana and 6 ability power every 45 seconds, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 health, 100 mana and 60 ability power.

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.description:
UNIQUE - Wind's Favor: Gain 20 Attack Damage or 40 Ability Power (Adaptive).
UNIQUE - Wind Blade: Attacks deal 15 bonus physical damage on-hit against targets.

items.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
items.description: UNIQUE - ICY: Damaging active abilities slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

items.name: Spirit Visage
items.description: UNIQUE - BLESSED: Increases heals and shields on yourself by 30%.

items.name: Sterak's Gage
items.description:
UNIQUE - STERAK'S FURY: Triggering LIFELINE increases size and grants 30% Tenacity for 3 seconds.

UNIQUE - LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce maximum health below 35%, you first gain a shield that absorbs 75% of your bonus health that decays over 3 seconds. (90 second cooldown)

Can only be purchased on melee champions.

items.name: Seraph's Embrace
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Grants bonus ability power equal to 3% maximum mana. Refunds 25% of mana spent.

UNIQUE - LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce maximum health below 35%, you first consume 15% of your current mana to shield yourself for an equal amount plus 100 for 2 seconds. (90 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.description:
UNIQUE - SHIV LIGHTING: Energized attacks bounce up to 5 nearby enemies, and each hit can critically strike.

UNIQUE - ENERGIZED: Moving and attacking generates Energy stacks. At maximum stacks your next basic attack deals 50 - 120 (based on level) bonus magic damage and activates all Energized effects.

items.name: Sunfire Aegis
items.description:
UNIQUE - IMMOLATE: Deals 16-25 magic damage +0.8% bonus HP per second to nearby enemies. Damaging champions or epic monsters with Immolate increases its damage by 11% for 5s, stacking up to 4 times. Immolate deals 15% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

UNIQUE - FLAME TOUCH: At max Immolate Stacks, attacks burn enemies around you for 50% of Immolate's damage over 3 seconds. Immolate deals 170% - 250% damage to minions and deals 130% damage to jungle monsters.

items.name: Umbral Glaive
items.description:
UNIQUE - SABOTAGE: +12 armor penetration

UNIQUE - BLACKOUT: When spotted by enemy wards or traps, gain Blackout for 8 seconds, disabling surrounding wards, as well as exposing stealthed wards and traps. (60 second cooldown)

UNIQUE: Your basic attacks instantly kill revealed traps and wards.

items.name: Trinity Force
items.description:
UNIQUE - FERVOR: +5% movement speed

UNIQUE - SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. (1.5 second cooldown which begins after using the empowered attack)

UNIQUE - Valor: Basic attacks (on-hit) grant +(20 Melee / 10 Ranged) flat movement speed for 2 seconds. Killing a unit grants +(60 Melee / 30 Ranged) flat movement speed instead. Bonuses do not stack.

items.name: Thornmail
items.description: UNIQUE - THORNS:  When hit by an enemy champion's attack, deal 20 + 6% bonus armor + 2% bonus health magic damage to the attacker, inflicting 50% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

items.name: Void Staff
items.description: UNIQUE - DISSOLVE: +45% magic penetration

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.description: UNIQUE - WARMOG'S HEART: If you have at least 950 bonus health, regenerate 4.5% maximum health per second if you haven't taken damage with the last 6 seconds.

items.name: Winter's Approach
items.description:
UNIQUE - AWE: Grants Ability Haste equal to 1% maximum mana. Refunds 15% of mana spent.

UNIQUE - MANA CHARGE: Increases max Mana by 12 every attack, when Mana is spent or when taking damage from champions, epic monsters, or towers. Triggers up to 3 times every 12 seconds.

Transforms into Fimbulwinter Fimbulwinter at +700 mana.

Limited to 1 AWE item.

items.name: Zeke's Convergence
items.description: UNIQUE - HARBINGER: Casting your Ultimate surrounds you with a blizzard for 10 seconds. The blizzard deals a maximum of 630–1050 damage, slows nearby enemies by 25%, and leaves a trail behind you. Allied champions on the trail gain 55 bonus Movement Speed for 1 second. (30s cooldown)

items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
items.description:
UNIQUE - SLICE: +15 armor penetration

UNIQUE - MOMENTUM: Moving builds Momentum, granting a maximum of 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks. Attacking removes all Momentum. Momentum decays while movement is impaired.

UNIQUE - SPECTRAL HASTE: Basic attacks that expend maximum Momentum grant 25% bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

items.name: Boots of Furor
items.description:
UNIQUE - RAGE: When you attack a target, you gain 30 movement speed for 2 seconds.

Limited to 1 Boots item.

items.name: Gluttonous Greaves
items.description:
UNIQUE - Conversion: +7% Omnivamp.

Limited to 1 Boots item.

items.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
items.description:
UNIQUE - SUMMONED: Reduces summoner spell cooldowns by 15%.

Limited to 1 Boots item.

items.name: Mercury's Treads
items.description:
+100% Health Regen

UNIQUE - DISSOLVE: Reduces magic damage taken by 7% - 12% (based on level).

Limited to 1 Boots item.

items.name: Plated Steelcaps
items.description:
+100% Health Regen

UNIQUE - BLOCK: Reduces physical damage taken by 7% - 10% (based on level).

Limited to 1 Boots item.

items.name: Gargoyle
items.description:
UNIQUE - STONEPLATE:  Gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 28% of max Health. The shield decays over 4 seconds. The shield value increases by 14% of max Health per enemy nearby, capped at 3 enemies. Damage dealt is reduced by 40% for 4 seconds.
Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Glorious
items.description:
UNIQUE - GLORY: Gain 15% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, increasing to 60% towards enemy champions or turrets. After 4 seconds or upon reaching an enemy champion emits a shockwave that slows nearby enemies by 50% for 2 seconds. (45 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Locket
items.description:
UNIQUE - LOCKET: Shield yourself and all nearby allied champions from 60 - 390 (based on level) damage for 2.5 seconds. (60 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Protobelt
items.description:
UNIQUE - PROTOBELT: Dash forward and unleash a cone of missiles that deal 70 (based on level) magic damage. If champions or monsters are hit by more than one missile, the additional missiles deal only 7 damage. (60 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Redeeming
items.description:
UNIQUE - REDEEM: Reveal a position and after 1.5 seconds, a beam of light heals allies for 25 - 375 (based on level). Minions and monsters take 250 true damage instead. (60 second cooldown)
This effect is reduced by 50% if the target has been affected by another Redemption within the last 20 seconds. 50% of cooldown will be returned if ally champions are not healed.

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Quicksilver
items.description:
UNIQUE - QUICKSILVER: Grants immunity to Crown Control effects for 0.75 seconds  and grants 30% Tenacity and 30% Slow Resistance for 1.5 seconds. (60 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Shadows
items.description:
UNIQUE - SHADOWS: Summons 2 ghosts that seek out nearby enemy champions. On contact, a champion is revealed and slowed by 40% for up to 5 seconds, based upon travel time. (60 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Stasis
items.description:
UNIQUE - STASIS: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering yourself untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but becoming unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities or item actives, or use any summoner spells during this time. (120 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Teleport
items.description:
UNIQUE - TELEPORT: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleport your champion to an allied champion, structure, or ward. (180 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Boots enchantment.

items.name: Winged Moonplate
items.description: UNIQUE - Flight: +5% movement speed

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.description: UNIQUE - Winter's Caress: Basic attacks and magic damage caused by you or inflicted upon you will apply stacks of Chill to the enemy champion for 3 seconds. Each stack of Chill slows enemy attack speed by 9%, up to a maximum of 4 stacks or 36% Attack Speed reduction. Each individual ability has a 3 second cooldown on applying Chill stacks.

items.name: Crystalline Reflector
items.description: UNIQUE -  Mirrored Force: Gain the mirror shard for 3 seconds each time while casting champion abilities, the duration time of the fragment can not be stacked. During the fragment's existence, it blocks 8 - 25 physical damage from the enemy champion, and deals 10 + 3% ability power +1& bonus health magic damage.

items.name: Force of Nature
items.description:
UNIQUE - Storm: +5% Movement Speed

UNIQUE - Absorb: When receiving skill damage, you can get a 7-second firmness layer, which can be stacked up to 4 times; dealing damage to champions can refresh the duration of the layer. At 6 stacks, gain 10% movement speed and reduce all magic damage taken by 25%.

items.name: Essence Reaver
items.description:
UNIQUE - Flare: After attacking a champion, enhances your next damaging ability or empowered attack up to 30% based on Critical chance, with a 4 second cooldown. Cooldown is also reduced by 1 second after hitting a champion with an attack.
UNIQUE - Mana Siphon: Attacks restore 3% missing Mana on-hit.

items.name: Navori Quickblades
items.description: UNIQUE - Deft Strikes: Your critical strikes with basic attacks reduce your non-ultimate ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

items.name: Prophet's Pendant
items.description: UNIQUE - Doomsayer: +12 Magic Penetration.

items.name: Serylda's Grudge
items.description:
UNIQUE - LAST WHISPER: +33% armor penetration.

UNIQUE - Icy: Damaging active abilities and empowered attacks slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

items.name: Staff of Flowing Water
items.description: UNIQUE - Rapids: Healing or shielding an ally grants you both 15 Ability Haste and 20 - 40 Ability Power (based on target's level) for 6 seconds.

items.name: Stormrazor
items.description:
Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.

Stormarrow: An Energized attack deals 65–135 bonus magic damage, slows the target by 50% for 0.75s, and grants you 45 Movement Speed for 0.75s.

items.name: Wit's End
items.description: UNIQUE - At Wit's End: Basic attacks deal 15 - 65 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit. While below 50% health, dealing damage to an enemy champion heals you for (Melee:100% / Ranged: 33%) of this effect's post-mitigation damage.

items.name: Banshee's Veil
items.description: UNIQUE PASSIVE - Annul: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability.

items.name: Solari Chargeblade
items.description: UNIQUE - Sunburst: Using an ability gathers Radiance (max 3 charges) for up to 10 seconds. Attacks that hit expend a charge to deal 50 - 92 bonus magic damage on hit; this bonus damage can critically strike. Each unique ability can only generate a charge every 2 seconds.

items.name: Edge of Night
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Annul: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability.
PASSIVE - Gouge: +8 Armor Penetration.

items.name: Hextech Megadrive
items.description: UNIQUE PASSIVE - Tinker: Immobilizing an enemy champion reduces the current cooldown of your active item by 15%, this effect will trigger multiple times if an effect hits multiple enemy champions at once.

items.name: Divine Sunderer
items.description: UNIQUE PASSIVE - SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next attack within 10 seconds will deal 10% of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage (7% if the attack is ranged). If the target is a champion, heal for 6% of the target's maximum health (2.5% if the attack is ranged). (1.5 second Cooldown) Damage is reduced vs structures.

items.name: Ixtali Seedjar
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Propagation: When you or an ally hit a nearby plant, it drops a seed that only you can see. You can pick up and replant that seed at any location on the map.
Picking up a seed grants +40% movement speed decaying over 2.5s.
PASSIVE - Spring: 5% movement speed.

items.name: Magnetron
items.description: Target a nearby ally champion or minion/monster within 8 range to dash to them. (50 second cooldown)

items.name: Hullbreaker
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - BOARDING PARTY:
While no allied champions are nearby, you gain 4-50 (2-25 if ranged) Armor and Magic Resistance (based on leve), and deal 4% additional damage to Structures. Nearby large minions gain 20-2 (10-20 if Ranged) Armor and Magic Resistance (based on level) and deal 40% increased damage to structures.

items.name: Repulsor
items.description:
Knock back enemies within 3.5 range to 3.5 range away from the caster.  (60 second cooldown)
After knocking back a champion, gain 30% Movement speed for 3s.

items.name: Riftmaker
items.description:
UNIQUE - Assimilation: +11% Omnivamp.

UNIQUE - Void Corruption: When in combat with champions, gain 1 stack of Corruption every 1 second. Each stack increases the damage you deal by 2.5%, up to 3 stacks. At maximum stacks, the additional damage provided by Corruption becomes true damage.

items.name: Veil
items.description: Grant a nearby targeted ally a spell shield for 3 seconds that blocks the next enemy ability. (45 second cooldown)

items.name: Spectral Sickle
items.description:
PASSIVE - Versatile: Gain 10 attack damage or 20 ability power.(adaptive)

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Gain 1 charge every 30 seconds (max 3 charges). When near an ally, damaging abilities and attacks against champions or structures grant 65 gold by consuming 1 charge and regenerate 20-80 health. Champions equipped with Spectral Sickle do not engage in minion bounty allocation and grant 50% of bounty solely, the bounty from minions taken down will be fully provided to the nearest ally. Grant only 50% gold from monsters.

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Quest: Transform to Black Mist Scythe after granting 750 gold.

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Tribute: Deal 1 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Harrowing Crescent
items.description:
PASSIVE - Versatile: 12 Attack Damage or 25 Ability Power (Adaptive)
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Tribute: While near an allied champion, damaging abilities and attacks against champions or structures grant 40 gold. These effects recharge every 15 seconds (max 3 charges). Earn 50% less gold from killing minions and monsters, earn 100% bonus gold from nearby minions your allies don

items.name: Black Mist Scythe
items.description:
PASSIVE - Versatile: 14 Attack Damage or 28 Ability Power (adaptive)
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Spellcraft: Grant 75 gold every 60 seconds and gain 1 point Spirit Power (max 10). Every point of Spirit Power provides 25 health, 2 Attack Damage or 4 Ability Power (adaptive).

PASSIVE - Soulcast: Deal 2 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Relic Shield
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Spoils of War: Gain 1 charge every 30 seconds (max 3 charges). When attacking minions, you consume 1 charge and execute minions below 65% health, granting full bounty to ally champions and bonus 65 gold to yourself and healing you for 15-65. Champions equipped with Relic Shield do not engage in minion bounty allocation and grant 50% of bounty solely, the bounty from minions taken down will be fully provided to the nearest ally. Grant only 50% gold from monsters.

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Quest: Transform to Bulwark of the Mountain after granting 750 gold. 

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Spoils of War: Deal 1 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Targon's Buckler
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Spoils of War: While near an ally, attacks consume a charge to execute minions below 75% health, granting your nearest ally kill gold, granting you 75 bonus Quest gold, and healing you for 15-65. Gain charges every 30 seconds (max 3 charges). Earn 50% less gold from killing minions and monsters, earn bonus gold from nearby minions your allies don't kill, and earn 1 gold per 3 seconds.
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to upgrade to Bulwark of the Mountain (this item only upgrades while out of combat).

items.name: Bulwark of the Mountain
items.description:
UNIQUE PASSIVE - Spellcraft: Grant 75 gold every 60 seconds and gain 1 point Spirit Power (max 10). Every point of Spirit Power provides 25 health, 2 Attack Damage or 4 Ability Power (adaptive).

UNIQUE PASSIVE - Soulcast: Deal 2 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Protect
items.description:
Grant the next heal or shield ability you use within 3s 100-25% increased heal and shield power (based on its cooldown; shorter cooldown spells get larger amounts of heal and shield power). 90 second cooldown.
0 - 20s cooldown: 100% increased heal and shield power
20 - 40s cooldown: 50% increased heal and shield power
> 40s cooldown: 25% increased heal and shield power
Protect Enchant tracks the base value of the cooldown, not its scaled value after Ability Haste.

items.name: Imperial Mandate
items.description: Coordinated Fire: Abilities that slow or immobilize a champion deal 47 - 75 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds (6s cooldown per champion). Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 94 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move speed for 2 seconds.

items.name: Meteor
items.description: Target a location within 30 range. After a 2.5 second delay, a meteor will fall from the sky at the targeted location, dealing 25% of each enemy

items.name: Cosmic Drive
items.description:
HYPERDRIVE: +5% Movement Speed

SPELLWEAVER: Damaging active abilities and empowered attacks on an enemy champion grant (30 + 70% Haste) Movement Speed decaying over 2 seconds. Subsequent triggers of Spellweaver from different sources refresh the buff duration and reset the movement speed value to the maximum. Each source has a 1s cooldown.

items.name: Serpent's Fang
items.description:
Armor penetration: 15
Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain for 3s. Melee champions apply (10% of bonus Attack Damage + 40)% shield reduction, capped at 60%; while ranged champions apply (10% of bonus Attack Damage + 25)% shield reduction, capped at 45%. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, all shields on them are reduced by the same values.

items.name: Horizon Focus
items.description: Passive - Hypershot: When a non-targeted ability hits a champion at least 500 range away, it applies one stack, and when you immobilize a champion, add 2 stacks (stacks last for 5 seconds). After reaching 3 stacks, consume the stacks to deal 90 + 25% Ability Power magic damage and apply another stack.

items.name: Dawnshroud
items.description: UNIQUE - Dawnbringer: When you immobilize a champion or are immobilized, damage and reveal all nearby enemy champions for 3 seconds, dealing 80+5% bonus health, as magic damage (3 second cooldown).

items.name: Lord Dominik's Regard
items.description:
Passive - Last Whisper: 16-30% Armor Penetration
Passive - Adrenaline: Your first attack on a champion after being out of combat with champions has 80% increased Attack Speed.

items.name: Amaranth's Twinguard
items.description: UNIQUE - ENDURANCE: While in combat with enemy champions, gain a stack of Endurance each second. When you reach 5 stacks of Endurance, gain 20% size, 20% tenacity, and increase your armor and magic resistance by 30% until you leave combat with champions.

items.name: Mantle of the Twelfth Hour
items.description: UNIQUE - LIFELINE: Damage that puts you under 35% Health grants bonus max Health equal to 180 + 45% bonus Health over 3 seconds, and provides 50% Slow Resist and 30 Movement Speed for 3 seconds. (90s cooldown)

items.name: Shimmering Spark
items.description: UNIQUE - IMMOLATE: Deal 5 - 10 magic damage to nearby enemies per second.

items.name: Immortal Shieldbow
items.description:
UNIQUE-Lifeline: Damage that puts you under 35% maximum health grants a shield in advance equal to 250-550 damage (increasing with levels) for 5 seconds. (90s Cooldown)

UNIQUE-Battle Furor: Triggering Lifeline will provide 8% physical vamp for 8 seconds.

items.name: Searing Crown
items.description:
UNIQUE - FIERY TOUCH: When the basic attack or skill deals damage, it burns the target for 3 seconds, causing magic damage equal to 1.4% of the target's maximum HP per second (when used by a ranged Champion, the damage is reduced to 0.8%).
Deals 150% damage to minions and monsters. Deals up to 125 damage to jungle monsters.

items.name: Nashor's Talon
items.description: UNIQUE - Magic Needle: Gain 20 Attack Damage or 40 Ability Power (adaptive).

items.name: The Collector
items.description:
UNIQUE - Killer: +10 Armor Penetration.
UNIQUE - Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% of their maximum health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

items.name: Talisman of Ascension
items.description:
Grant 75 gold every 60 seconds and gain 1 point Spirit Power (max 10). Every point of Spirit Power provides 25 health, 2 Attack Damage or 4 Ability Power (adaptive).

Soulcast: Deal 2 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Ancient Coin
items.description:
Charge once per 30 seconds (max 3 charges). Every minion nearby taken down will grant 65 gold by consuming 1 charge, and regenerate 20-80 health. Champions equipped with Ancient Coin do not engage in minion bounty allocation and grant 50% of bounty solely, the bounty from minions taken down will be fully provided to the nearest ally. Grant only 50% gold from monsters.

Transform to Talisman of Ascension after granting 750 gold.

Offering: Deal 1 more damage to Sight Wards revealed by Sweeping Lens, Control Ward, and Scryer's Bloom.

items.name: Boots of Mana
items.description:
+150% Mana Regeneration

UNIQUE -  Magic Break: +8 Magic penetration.

items.name: Revitalizing Grail
items.description: Bless : Bonus 20% effect of shield or heal for ally champions.

items.name: Boots of Outburst
items.description: UNIQUE - Strike: +10 Armor penetration.

items.name: Hextech Alternator
items.description: Revved: Damaging abilities and empowered attacks against champions deal 25 - 60 bonus magic damage. (20 second cooldown)

items.name: Magnetic Blaster
items.description:
Fervor: +5% Movement Speed.
Energized: Moving and attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
Power Blitz: Energized Attacks generate 25% faster, gain 125 range (50 range for melee attacks), and deal 50 - 120 bonus magic damage. Damage bounces to 5 nearby enemies an can Critically Strike.

items.name: Surging Scales
items.description: Surge: Gain 20% Slow Resist while in combat with an enemy champion.

items.name: Chempunk Chainsword
items.description: Punishment: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions applies 50% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

items.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
items.description:
Glory: Gain Glory stacks when engaging in taking down enemy champions, up to a maximum of 30 stacks. Lose 10 stacks on Death. Melee champions gain 3 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist. Ranged champions gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist.
Fear: Gain 5 Ability Power for each stack of Glory, and 10% bonus movement speed once you reach at least 50 stacks of Glory.

items.name: Oceanid's Trident
items.description: Lethal Weapon: Dealing ability damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain for 3s (Area of effect abilities apply 5% of bonus Ability Power + 25% shield reduction, capped at 45%; while single target abilities apply 5% of bonus Ability Power + 40% shield reduction, capped at 60%). When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Lethal Weapon, all shields on them are reduced by the same values.

items.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
items.description:
Safeguard: Grant a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. When the shield is broken, reduce incoming damage by 40% for 1s (40s cooldown).
Poise: Ability Power increases by 20 while Safeguarded.
Dealing magic damage to enemy champions using an active ability reduces Safeguard's cooldown by 4 seconds.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.description: UNIQUE - Dragon Awakening: Increases Ability Haste of basic abilities by 25% for 10 seconds after casting an Ultimate, and grants 25% bonus Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds. Scoring a takedown within 10 seconds refreshes the ability's duration. (20s cooldown)

items.name: Titanic Hydra
items.description:
UNIQUE - Colossus: Gain Attack Damage equal to 15 + 2.5% bonus Health.
UNIQUE - Cleave: Every 1.75 seconds, your next attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 25 + 3% bonus Health (also applies to turrets), creating a shockwave (550 range) that deals physical damage equal to 80 + 10% bonus Health to enemies behind the target. (Ranged champions deal 75% of the damage.)

items.name: Heartsteel
items.description: UNIQUE - Colossal Consumption: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, charges for 2.5 seconds before dealing a huge strike against the enemy champion. This charged attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 140 + 3.5% of maximum Health, and grants maximum Health equal to 15% of the damage dealt. The charge for each target has a 20-second cooldown.

items.name: Ruin - Blade of the Ruined King
items.description:
Thirst: 12% Physical Vamp.

Ruined Strikes: Attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 7% of the enemy's current Health on-hit. (Melee attacks deal 9%). Minimum damage: 15. Max damage vs monsters: 60.

Repentance: Reduces your base Health by 5-80.

Drain: Hitting a champion with 3 attacks or abilities deal 30-100 magic damage and steals 40% of their Movement Speed for 2 seconds. (60s Cooldown)

items.name: Light - Youmuu's Ghostblade
items.description:
Slice: 15 Armor Penetration.

Momentum: Moving builds Momentum, granting up to 50 Movement Speed and 3-6 Armor Pen at 100 stacks. Attacking removes all Momentum, but Armor Pen will last for 3 seconds after. Stacks decay when movement is impaired.

Spectral Haste: Attacking with max Momentum grants 25% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

items.name: Terminus
items.description:
Shadow: Attacks deal 35 bonus magic damage on-hit.

Juxtaposition: Alternate between Light and Dark on-hits when attacking. Light attacks grant 5-8 Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds on hit. Dark attacks grant 10% Armor Pen and Magic Pen for 5 seconds on hit. The upper limit of armor and magic penetration rates is 40% when equipped. Each on-hit effect stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Ruin - Sterak's Gage
items.description:
Guilt Bearer: Reduces your Movement Speed by 5.

Heavy Handed: +50% base Attack Damage as bonus Attack Damage.

Lifeline: Damage that puts you under 35% Health preemptively grants a shield that absorbs damage equal to 75% bonus health and decays over 5 seconds (90s cooldown)

Sterak's Fury: Triggering Lifeline increases size, empowers you, removes all crowd control effects on you (except Airborne), and grants 50% Tenacity for 4 seconds.

items.name: Ruin - Rabadon's Deathcap
items.description:
Cinders: Reduces your base Health by 5-80.

Overkill: Increases AP by 25-50% (based on level).

items.name: Ruin - Amaranth's Twinguard
items.description:
Withering: Reduces your Attack Damage by 1-15.

Endurance: Gain 1 stack of Endurance every 1 second while in combat with enemy champions (max 3 stacks). At maximum stacks, gain 20% size, 20% Tenacity, and increase Armor by 35% and magic resistance by 35% until out of combat with champions.

items.name: Ruin - Warmog's Armor
items.description:
Dead End: Reduces your Attack Damage by 1-15.

Warmog's Heart: If you have at least 1,150 bonus Health and have not taken any damage during the last 4 seconds, restore 5% max health per second.

Strength of Will: Restores 0.3% max Health per second.

items.name: Light - Horizon Focus
items.description:
Hypershot: Damaging an enemy champion with an ability from 600 units away reveals them for 6 seconds and increases damage dealt to them by 9%.

Focus: When Hypershot is triggered, reveals all enemy champions within 1200 units of the target for 2 seconds. (15s cooldown)

items.name: Ruin - Infinity Edge
items.description:
Self-Destruction: Reduces your base health by 5-80.

Infinity: Critical Strikes deal 220% damage instead of 175%.

items.name: Light - Infinity Orb
items.description:
Destiny: 5% Movement Speed

Balance: 15 Magic Penetration

Inevitable Demise: Abilities and empowered attacks Critically Strike for 20% bonus damage against enemies below 45% Health.

items.name: Sundered Sky
items.description: Lightshield Strike - The first attack against an enemy champion Critically Strikes (6s cooldown per target), dealing 160% damage and restoring Health (equal to 125% of base Attack Damage + 5% of missing Health) to you.

items.name: Light - Riftmaker
items.description:
Assimilation: 12% Omnivamp

Void Corruption: When in combat with champions, gain 1 stack of Corruption every 1 second. Each stack increases the damage you deal by 2.5% up to 4 stacks. At maximum stacks, the additional damage provided by Corruption becomes true damage.

items.name: Light - Harmonic Echo
items.description: Harmonic Echo: Moving and casting abilities builds Harmony. At 100 Harmony, your next healing or shielding ability cast on an ally restores Health equal to 135 + 10% Ability Power to your target and up to 3 nearby allied champions. Every 10 Ability Haste you have increases healing by 1%.

items.name: Light - Dawnshroud
items.description: Dawnbringer: If you are within 400 units of an enemy champion, and you immobilize a champion or are immobilized, reveal all nearby enemy champions for 3 seconds, deal 80 + 5% bonus Health as magic damage and heal yourself for the same amount, for 3 seconds. (3s cooldown)

items.name: Redemption
items.description: Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 15% of the damage taken from champions. When consuming Mana, restore health equal to  20% of mana consumed. Every cast restores Maximum 15 Health Salvation: Heal ally units in the range of 350 for (50 + 6% bonus health) every 8s. If no allied champions are around, Salvation will not be triggered

items.name: Ravenous Hydra
items.description: Ravenous Crescent - Deal adaptive damage (140% of Attack Damage + 30% of Ability Power) to nearby enemies and restore Health by 60% of the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to minions and monsters. (10s cooldown)

items.name: Eclipse
items.description: Ever Rising Moon - Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.8 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to 6% of the target's Max Health (3% for ranged champions), and grants you a shield that absorbs damage equal to 140 + 35% bonus Attack Damage (70 + 18% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds. (6s cooldown)

items.name: Hextech Soulstealer
items.description:
Unique Passive - Soul Hunt: +15 magical penetration

Unique Passive - Wandering Soul: Every time you take down an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them, your ability cooldowns are reduced by 25%. You steal 15% of their base Movement Speed for 10 seconds and 75% of their Ability Haste until they respawn. Ability Haste stolen this way stacks.

items.name: Psychic Projector
items.description:
Conversion - Gain Ability Power equal to 3% of bonus Health. Up to 60 Ability Power can be gained this way.

Projection - When taking champion damage, gain a non-stacking shield that absorbs damage equal to 30 + 10% of Ability Power + 5% of bonus Health for 3 seconds (for ranged champions, the shield absorbs damage equal to 60% of this value). Triggers every 3 seconds.

items.name: Hextech Stormrazor
items.description:
Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.

Stormarrow: An Energized attack deals 65–135 bonus magic damage, slows the target by 75% for 0.75s, and grants you 60 Movement Speed for 0.75s.

items.name: Hextech Black Cleaver
items.description:
UNIQUE - SUNDER: Dealing physical damage to a champion reduces their Armor by 6% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for 24% reduction.

UNIQUE - RAGE: Gain 20 Movement Speed when you deal physical damage, and gain 40 Movement Speed when moving toward enemy champions with 4 Sunder stacks. Ranged champions gain halved values.

items.name: Hextech Zeke's Convergence
items.description: UNIQUE - HARBINGER: Casting your Ultimate surrounds you with a blizzard for 10 seconds. The blizzard deals a maximum of 630–1050 damage, slows nearby enemies by 35%, and leaves a trail behind you. Allied champions on the trail gain 55 bonus Movement Speed for 1 second. (30s cooldown)

items.name: Kaenic Rookern
items.description: Magebane - After not taking magic damage for 12 seconds, gain a magic shield that absorbs damage (equal to 70-180+10% of max Health).

items.name: Yordle Trap
items.description: Catcher - After applying crowd control effects that displace the enemy, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and mark the target, reducing their Armor and Magic Resist by 5-12 for 5 seconds. If the target dies while they are marked, you and nearby allies gain 200-300 bonus gold in total. The bonus gold can only be earned once every 10 seconds.

items.name: Dream Maker
items.description: Gain a Blue Dream Bubble and a Purple Dream Bubble every 8 seconds. Healing or shielding an ally blows both Dream Bubbles to them, empowering them for 3 seconds. Blue Bubble reduces the next incoming damage by 70-140, while Purple Bubble grants 20-90 bonus magic damage on the next hit.
